content: Enter the password for the user with the access rights to read data from LDAP server.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining the password field's purpose in an LDAP authentication setup. It appears on a form component, specifically above the password input field, and is intended to help users understand what they are required to enter.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Giriş hüququ olan' is a bit clunky. It could be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP serverdən məlumat oxumaq üçün istifadəçinin şifrəsini daxil edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation retains 'LDAP' which is fine, but a more consistent approach might be to translate it if consistently used elsewhere in the application. For this verification, I assume the English word is meant to stay as is.

The translation 'Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό πρόσβασης για τον χρήστη με τα δικαιώματα πρόσβασης για την ανάγνωση δεδομένων από τον διακομιστή LDAP' is a bit verbose and could be simplified.  The phrase 'με τα δικαιώματα πρόσβασης' (with the access rights) is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό πρόσβασης για τον χρήστη που έχει δικαιώματα πρόσβασης στον διακομιστή LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation could be improved for readability by breaking it into two sentences if appropriate for the UI context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό πρόσβασης. Είναι ο κωδικός πρόσβασης για τον χρήστη που έχει δικαιώματα πρόσβασης στον διακομιστή LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Syötä salasana käyttäjälle, jolla on LDAP-palvelimen lukuoikeudet.' while understandable, is a bit literal and could be more natural in Finnish. It directly translates 'Enter the password for the user with the access rights...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Syötä LDAP-palvelimen lukuoikeuksia omaavan käyttäjän salasana.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Saisissez' could be improved for clarity and a slightly more natural tone. While technically correct, it's somewhat formal for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Entrez

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and somewhat awkward. "Մուտքագրեք օգտվողի գաղտնաբառը, ով ունի LDAP սերվերից տվյալները կարդալու մուտքի իրավունք" translates to "Enter the password of the user who has the right to read data from the LDAP server." It's not the most natural phrasing in Armenian. It's a bit long and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք LDAP սերվերի տվյալներ կարդալու համար անհրաժեշտ գաղտնաբառը։ (Enter the password required to read data from the LDAP server.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a long sentence. While grammatically correct, a tooltip is often better with more concise language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider breaking the sentence into two shorter sentences if possible to improve readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'con diritti di accesso per leggere' is slightly awkward. It can be more concisely expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: con i permessi per leggere

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໃສ່' (sai) could be more precisely translated as 'ປ້ອນ' (pon) which means 'enter'. While 'ໃສ່' is not incorrect, 'ປ້ອນ' is more commonly used for entering data in a digital context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ້ອນລະຫັດລັບສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີສິດອະນຸຍາດອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow in Lao. Adding a conjunction to connect the phrases would enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ້ອນລະຫັດລັບສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ມີສິດອະນຸຍາດອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP, ເພື່ອອ່ານຂໍ້ມູນຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'lai nolasītu datus no LDAP servera' (to read data from LDAP server) is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing in Latvian would be 'lai piekļūtu LDAP serverim' (to access the LDAP server) or 'lai varētu piekļūt LDAP serverim' (to be able to access the LDAP server).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ievadiet paroli lietotājam ar piekļuves tiesībām, lai piekļūtu LDAP serverim.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and could be more natural-sounding in Dutch. The phrase "om gegevens van de LDAP server te lezen" is grammatically correct, but less idiomatic than other options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voer het wachtwoord in voor de gebruiker met de juiste toegang tot de LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'toegangsrechten' (access rights) sounds formal and somewhat clunky. A more common and natural wording would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voer het wachtwoord in voor de gebruiker met de benodigde toegang tot de LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is slightly awkward and could be more natural. 'Direitos de acesso para ler dados' is a bit verbose. It's possible to convey the meaning more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Insira a senha do usuário com permissão para ler dados do servidor LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not entirely accurate. "Introduceți" is correct for 'Enter', but the phrase "permisiuni de citire pentru serverul LDAP" is a bit clunky and not the most natural Romanian phrasing for 'access rights to read data from LDAP server'. A more fluent translation would convey the same meaning more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduceți parola pentru utilizatorul cu drepturi de acces la citirea datelor din serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks consistency with English content, which uses 'access rights'. A direct equivalent of 'access rights' would enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more consistent terminology like 'drepturi de acces' to match the English phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයා' (parishilakaya) is a somewhat formal term for 'user'. While not strictly incorrect, 'වියත්කරුවා' (viyathkaruwa) or simply 'පරිශීලක' (parishilaka) might be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP සර්වරයෙන් දත්ත කියවීමට අයිතිය ඇති 'වියත්කරුවා' සඳහා මුරපදය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The direct translation maintains the English sentence structure, which can sound slightly awkward in Sinhala. Consider a more natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP සර්වරයෙන් දත්ත කියවීමට අයිතිය ඇති පරිශීලකයාගේ මුරපදය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian word 'правима' is a grammatically acceptable but less common/formal way to say 'rights'. 'права' would be more common and preferred in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Унесите лозинку за корисника са правом приступа за читање података са LDAP сервера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is too literal and lacks natural flow. 'Enter the password for the user with the access rights to read data from LDAP server' is a more understandable phrasing in English. The Turkish translation sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP sunucusundan veri okuma yetkisine sahip kullanıcının parolasını girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'LDAP' is inconsistent. The English source keeps it capitalized, the Turkish translation doesn't. It's preferable to keep it consistent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP sunucusundan veri okuma yetkisine sahip kullanıcının parolasını girin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit literal and could be more natural-sounding. "Truy cập để đọc" is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập mật khẩu cho người dùng có quyền truy cập đọc dữ liệu từ máy chủ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'đọc dữ liệu' could benefit from closer proximity to 'truy cập' to improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập mật khẩu cho người dùng có quyền truy cập để đọc dữ liệu từ máy chủ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and awkward. It doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. The phrase '具有从 LDAP 服务器 读取数据的访问权限的用户的密码' is complex and not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 输入用于从 LDAP 服务器读取数据的用户的密码。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is overly long and complex for a tooltip. Tooltips generally require brevity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 输入用于从 LDAP 服务器读取数据的用户的密码。
